column2: "<%me>...  As you probably expected, the pink flower you brought back the other day was a dead end."
"Still, at least it made her happy, just like last time, so..."
"But, well, anyway. She really really showed interest in this flower this time, I'm certain of it!"
"It's a rare yellow flower that the Rappies gather. This one right here. I just know this is the one we need!"
"Please, for Matoi's sake, go find this flower. Whenever you have time is fine!"
